name: Enjoy Scales
description:
[arrow keys to move and space bar to jump.]

Learn music scales catching the right notes and enjoy improving yourself!

Break your own records!

Available also on Google Play Store.

This is a home made game, this is actually my very first project. 

It's designed for mobile but I uploaded here so that anyone can play it also on pc.

Hope you like it. Feedback and comments are appreciated!

Feel free to subscribe to my youtube channel: 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRguYKTaNk9lfW_eCBtjB4A

Or follow me on Twitter:

https://twitter.com/mokigames
